# Change log

## [v0.3.0] - 2016-05-21

### Fixed
* Fix prev_line to work in iTerm2 and Putty by @m-o-e

## [v0.2.0] - 2015-12-28

### Changed
* Change #clear_lines to clear first and move up/down

## [v0.1.0] - 2015-11-28

* Initial implementation and release
